document_name_accent: ung thu buong trung giai doan 4.json
document_title: Stage 4 ovarian cancer: Symptoms, treatment and prognosis
subsection_name: ung-thu-buong-trung-giai-doan-4.json_3_How long can you live with stage IV ovarian cancer?
subsection_content:
So how long can stage IV ovarian cancer patients live? Based on the SEER 22 database (statistics from 2013 to 2019), the 5-year survival rate for stage IV ovarian cancer patients is about 31%. (4)
However, this rate is only a prediction, the actual treatment results depend on many other factors such as pathology, the patient's general health status, treatment response, etc.
